channel.title: Monster Description Cards ( Last days)
channel.description: So just wanted to let you guys (and gals) know about the Monster Description Cards Kickstarter. I think it's lovely and their previous cards decks are a stable behind my GM screen. [https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ConflictRPG/monster-description-cards-for-writers-storytellers-and-gms?ref=8wltsf](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ConflictRPG/monster-description-cards-for-writers-storytellers-and-gms?ref=8wltsf) ![MonsterCrusadesCards550|550x478](upload://tKyzqrrNMP0i1je5WkoKaTgMwz2.gif)

item.title: Monster Description Cards ( Last days)
item.dc:creator: @Diannemariz18
item.description:
@Diannemariz18 wrote:

Just Officially backed, can see any reasons why not. Except that they are a little expensive but today’s special brought it down to 24 bucks so i’m in.

anywho, this is my psa for day - cheers
